author: jmarino
msg: limit wire optimizations to AtomicComponent targets

author: nagy
msg: Moved shutdown code from ListenerManager to ConfigurationContext, since that is where much of the initialization happens (e.g. module initialization,) and made sure that everything will be shut down properly when the JVM terminates -- this is important especially with respect to JAX-WS, as it does not provide a way for a client to signal that it is done with the runtime.

author: gnodet
msg: Include integration tests in the build, and svn ignore some files
